modName: Bilbo Baggins - Follower Mod Beta Version-1-1 - Discontinued
summary:
I am no longer working on this mod as i have started developing a brand new mod bringing the magic of the hobbit trilogy to skyrim! MORE INFO COMING SOON
Have you ever wanted Bilbo Baggins joining you on your adventures throughout skyrim? Well, look no further! This Mod is in VERY early stages of development (Planned features below)
descriptionHtml:
Planned Features:
- Fully custom voiced.
- Full Character Questline
- Custom made Items (One Ring, Sting and Clothes)

A few things to take note:
- This is the first ever mod i have attempted development so give me a break with bugs and development time as all this process is new to me.
- Any little bit of help and feedback is very much appreciated as I want to make this as good as possible.
Installation
Extract into data folder.
Requirements
No requirements YET

Version 1.1 Changelog
- Adjusted height
- New hair style and colour
- Now a follower
- Fixed grey head bug
- Added suprise waiting for you in helgen keep! (only for fun)
author: NukaLeapz11
